summary: Pikes Peak is a 14,110-foot mountain near Colorado Springs, Colorado, United States.
full_text: Katharine Lee Bates  was an American songwriter. She is remembered as the author of the words to the anthem "America the Beautiful". She popularized "Mrs. Santa Claus" through her poem Goody Santa Claus on a Sleigh Ride .
title: Katharine Lee Bates
